rules_text:
Flying
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Dagny, Sun’s Chariot, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {WB}{WB}. If you do, transform Dagny, Sun’s Chariot.
rules_text2:
Flying
Whenever this creature transforms into Signa, Moon’s Chariot, create a 1/1 white and black Horse creature token with lifelink.
At the beginning of your combat on your turn, you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, transform Signa, Moon’s Chariot.
